row.comment1: 1 - Enable More Games Button, 0 - Disable More Games Button

row.text: Would you like some interactive help?
Select a person to speak with them.
Examine the satchel. Press this area to have a closer look.
Select the item to add it to your inventory.
You can take the item you've collected and use it on the lock to open it.
Hover over the screen edge to open the inventory. Note the Taxi Shape. Complex items require special actions or applications before they can help you. Select the item to have a closer look.
If you have trouble finding the item or you need a hint, select the Hint button at the bottom.
Select the sparkling area to examine it.
Great! You opened navigation to another location. Press here to go there.
Find the map in the left bottom corner of the screen. Select to open it.
Select the open location on the map to move there.
The directions for playing the mini-game are in the Info section at the bottom of the screen. To skip the minigame, press the Skip button. Select Reset button to start over.
Puzzle Pieces are hidden in most scenes. Find them to add to your collectibles. Select the pop-up window to view your collectibles.
Collectibles are hidden on locations. When you find them, they are added to your collection. To view it, select the pop-up window.
Press this button to see your current task.
Find all the items on the list.
On the side of the interface, you see silhouette images of various items. Find all the items.
In order to advance on the map, go to the places marked with a cross. Find the items per the list in each location.
At the bottom of the interface, you see silhouette images of various items. Find all the items. Place the items on the shelf to clear the passage.
You will earn achievements during the gameplay. You can view them by selecting the Pop-Up Window or by pressing the button on the Achievement screen in the Bonus Content menu.
At the bottom of the interface, you see images of different textures. Find all the items from the same materials as the samples show.
You unlocked the Secret Room. Complete quests to earn achievements.
This panel shows you how many morphing objects you've found during the current quest.
This timer shows how much time has passed since you activated the Secret Room.
This is the achievements panel. You gain achievements when you meet certain conditions.
This is the progress bar. It shows your progress on the Secret Room quests.
Complete one HOP without any hints.
Complete three HOPs without any hints.
Complete five HOPs without any hints.
Complete all HOPs without any hints.
Finish three HOPs in less than three minutes each.
row.comment1: Прохождение 3-х ХО подряд, меньше чем за 3 минуты каждое

row.text: Finish five HOPs in less than three minutes each.
row.comment1: Прохождение 5-и ХО подряд, меньше чем за 3 минуты каждое

row.text: Finish 10 HOPs in less than three minutes each.
row.comment1: Прохождение 10-и ХО подряд, меньше чем за 3 минуты каждое

row.text: Find three items in a HOP in three seconds.
Find five items in a HOP in five seconds.
Find 10 items in a HOP in 10 seconds.
Play one HOP more than 10 minutes.
row.comment1: Прохождение 1-го ХО больше чем за 10 минут

row.text: Finish a HOP in less than a minute.
row.comment1: Прохождение 1-го ХО меньше чем за 1 минуту

row.text: Solve a mini-game in less than a minute.
row.comment1: Прохождение 1-ой МГ меньше чем за 1 минуту
Прохождение 3-х ХО подряд, меньше чем за 3 минуты каждое
Прохождение 5-и ХО подряд, меньше чем за 3 минуты каждое
Прохождение 10-и ХО подряд, меньше чем за 3 минуты каждое
Прохождение 1-го ХО больше чем за 10 минут
Прохождение 1-го ХО меньше чем за 1 минуту
Прохождение 1-ой МГ меньше чем за 1 минуту

row.text: Would you like to set the screensaver on your desktop?
Would you like to save the wallpaper to your documents folder and set it to your desktop?
Would you like to download this picture into your documents folder?
Would you like to download this soundtrack into your documents folder?
Complete the game to unlock the bonus content.
Complete the Bonus Game to unlock the Secret Room.
Complete the standard version of the mini-game in the main menu play.
Mac OS doesn't support screensavers. Would you like to use this image as a wallpaper?
The bonus content isn't available in the demo version.
You are about to enter the location with no collection items. Would you like to proceed?
Congratulations! You've completed the Main Game! Now you can go on to the Bonus Game. Find it in the Bonus Content section of the main menu.
Congratulations! You have completed the game!
You have completed the Secret Game! Are you sure you want to start over from the beginning?
Are you sure you want to start over from the beginning?
You haven't completed the Secret Game yet.
How much kindness there is in a person, so much life is in him.
Every act of mercy is a step on the ladder leading to heaven.
There's something inside... that they can't get to, that they can't touch. That's yours. That's hope.
The one who believes in his luck is lucky.
Enjoying every day is very important, isn't it?
It is only their thoughts that make a person unhappy or happy, not external circumstances. By controlling their thoughts, they control their happiness.
Sometimes you have to look hard at something to see its value.
Love always promises the impossible and makes you believe in the impossible.
People don’t always need advice. Sometimes all they really need is a hand to hold, an ear to listen, and a heart to understand them.
The key to family happiness is in kindness, frankness, responsiveness.
Memories are what can make us smile or make us sad. But without them, our life would have been lived in vain.
It is not enough to believe in miracles. You need to do something to make them come.
Complete the Bonus Game to unlock the Secret Room.
No sound device was detected. The game will continue without audio.
Your profile was corrupted. All progress was lost. You must start a new game.
Are you sure you want to quit?
Are you sure you want to return to the main menu?
That name is already in use. Please choose another one.
Are you sure you want to delete this profile?
Are you sure you want to start the game from the beginning?
Are you sure you want to start the Bonus Game from the beginning?
You may encounter poor game performance. Do you want to disable special effects?
The current desktop display setting isn't large enough to show the game window.
The current desktop display setting isn't large enough to show the game window.
For new or casual players who want a relaxed gameplay session. Hint and Skip recharge quickly. Significant game locations sparkle. Active tasks are shown on the map.
For advanced players who want to overcome obstacles without extra help. Hint and Skip take longer to recharge. Significant locations don't sparkle. Active tasks are shown on the map.
For those who want to play the game without any help. No Hint or Skip feature. No sparkle indicator. Active tasks aren't shown on the map.
The current desktop display setting isn't large enough to show the game window.
Hints are disabled in this difficulty mode.
There's no Skip option in this mode.
For the best experience, please play with sound.
